text.about:
Four stars, 59 luxury rooms: the Hotel MCT in Kortrijk is the ultimate in comfort and class. The neoclassical baroque style of the imposing main mine building is a showpiece from our industrial past. In the present, the building has been given a trendy, future-oriented interpretation… Welcome to Hotel MCT! Hotel MCT nestles in the greenery of Kortrijk amid lush auna and flora and impressive water features. Unique views from the mine slag heaps and headframe bring the memory of the coal mining past closer than ever. The hotel's trump card is the enchanting French garden, as a link with the main entrance gate to Belgium's only National Park: a genuine hiking mecca. Furthermore, along this road you also take the step to a different kind of paradise… The shopping paradise of Kortrijk Village! There you will be welcomed 7 days a week in a picturesque shopping setting. More than 100 luxurious fashion and
  lifestyle brands are ready for you. What are you waiting for?
